title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Backcountry Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Backcountry Area & Cabins     Backcountry Lodging              Backcountry Lodging       Remote Lodging Options Inside Wrangell-St. Elias National Park & Preserve These are accommodations inside the park, that are only accessible by airplane. Ultima Thule Lodge 100 miles Upper Chitina River PO Box 109, Chitina, AK 99566 (907) 854-4500 www.ultimathulelodge.com Carol Ann Webb B&B Located in Chisana, AK (907) 734-2675 Wrangell R Ranch Located in Chisana, AK PO Box CZN, Tok, AK 99780 (907) 734-7373 There are also several Outfitters and Guides that offer accommodations as part of their services inside the park. These listings are provided as a service to our visitors and imply no specific endorsement by the National Park Service or Wrangell-St. Elias National Park & Preserve. If you know of a remote lodging option in the park that should be listed here, please email us.
